edu.harvard.integer.access

Class NoAuthentication

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.integer.access.NoAuthentication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authentication

    public class NoAuthentication
extends java.lang.Object
implements Authentication
    The Class NoAuthentication is used for accessing IP nodes without any authentication needed. For example ICMP would not need any authentication.
